name: Chest
description: Includes the pectoral muscles, targeting upper body strength.

name: Back
description: Focuses on the muscles of the upper, middle, and lower back, including the lats and traps.

name: Legs
description: Targets the quadriceps, hamstrings, and calves for lower body strength.

name: Shoulders
description: Works the deltoid muscles to improve shoulder strength and stability.

name: Arms
description: Includes exercises for biceps, triceps, and forearms.

name: Core
description: Strengthens the abdominal muscles and lower back for stability and posture.

name: Glutes
description: Focuses on the muscles of the buttocks, important for lower body power and strength.
